## getToken() function

Returns an Installation auth token, identifying the current Firebase Installation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getToken(installations: Installations, forceRefresh?: boolean): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  installations | [Installations](./installations.installations.md) | The <code>Installations</code> instance. |
|  forceRefresh | boolean | Force refresh regardless of token expiration. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
